LAV SRIVASTAVA 

 
CONTACT DETAILS 
 
Email ID :     Lav.srivastava.nitjsr@gmail.com 
Contact No. :     +91 9742121115 
Location :     Bangalore 
 
EDUCATION 
 
Master of Business Administration (MBA), Operations and Finance Management 
College           : Indian Institute of Management (IIM), Jammu 
Score              : 7.75 CGPA (2019) 
 
International Management, Internationalization Strategy 
College           : ESCP Europe, Berlin (Germany) 
 
Bachelor of Technology, Mechanical Engineering 
College           : National Institute of Technology (NIT), Jamshedpur 
Score            : 8.76 CGPA (2013) 
 
Intermediate School Certificate 
Board            : Central Board of Secondary Education 
Score           : 83.60% (2008) 
 
Matriculation Certificate 
Board              : Central Board of Secondary Education 
Score               : 88.60% (2006) 
 
WORK EXPERIENCE 
 
1. Management Consultant  
 
Period             : April 2019 to Present 
Employer        : Fonds Nikkel Consulting LLP 
 
Roles and Responsibillities:  
 
• Carry out research and data collection to understand the organization and conduct data analysis 
• Interview the client's employees, management team and other stakeholders 
• Prepare business proposals and presentations 
• Identify issues and form hypotheses & solutions and present findings and recommendations to clients 
• Implement recommendations/solutions 
• Liaise with the client to keep them informed of progress and to make relevant decisions 
 
2. Raw Material Procurement Planning and Inbound Logistics Engineer 
 
Period             : August 2013 to July 2017 
Department   : Supply Chain Management (Low Voltage Breakers and Switches) 
Employer        : ABB India Private Limited 



Roles and Responsibilities: 
 
• Periodic release of purchase orders and scheduling agreements to imported and local suppliers 
• Follow-ups with CHA and Freight Forwarders for ensuring compliance to delivery schedules 
• Working with cross functional teams like Engineering, Quality, Production and Planning for day to day   
   requirements and smooth functioning of Production 
• SAP MM MRP settings for imported components to control inventory and material flow 
• Preparation and Analysis of inventory report on daily basis through SAP 
• Supplier performance evaluation and meeting suppliers to improve performance on monthly 
 
SUMMER INTERNSHIP 
 
GAIL (India) Limited, Noida (Apr’ 18-May’ 18) 
• Analyzed if, Unbundling will remove conflict of Interest and develop natural gas market in India  
• Proposed various stages to carry out Unbundling in order to increase consumption of clean energy 
• Analyzed GAIL Financial Statements to identify the sustainability of Marketing and Transportation Business  
   after Unbundling process is over 
 
Tata Motors Limited, Jamshedpur (Apr’ 12-Jun’ 12) 
•Worked on Reducing of Core Scab Defect in 6 BT Engine by 3% in Foundry Section 
 
CERTIFICATION 
 
• Successfully completed training program on Six Sigma Green Belt from ISI Delhi in April 2018 
• Successfully completed ISO 9001:2015 Internal Auditor Training Course certified by TUV in 2017 
 
PROJECT 
 
• Applied queuing model to Increase Darshan Time at ‘Shri Mata Vaishno Devi’ Temple 
• Proposed future market entry strategies in line with current business model to KTM 
• Market Research done to identify impact of ‘Counterfeit Products’ in Indian Market 
 
HONORS & AWARDS 
 
• Received Sponsorship from Tata Motors, Jamshedpur for Under Graduation final year internship. 
• Secured 2nd rank in event ‘SHAPE SHIFTER (ROBOTICS)’ among 87 teams in National level Technical fest, 
OJASS 2010. 
 
POSITION OF RESPONSIBILITY 
 
• Member of Sports Committee of IIM Jammu. 
• Member of Organizing Committee of sports event Funathon-2017 in IIM Jammu. 
• Part of Tata Motors CSR activity – Gurukul aimed at producing skilled manpower to school dropouts. 
 
SOFTWARE SKILLS 
 
• Knowledge of Minitab, SPSS, C++. 
• Worked on SAP- MM module. 
 
 
I hereby declare that all the information stated above is true to my knowledge.                     Lav Srivastava

Madhur Modi 
   AB-104, Mayank Apartments, Dwarka Sector 6, Delhi-110075, India   |    Birth Date: 25 Dec 1991    
   +919560463829   |       madhurm2017@email.iimcal.ac.in   |    LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/madhurmd/ 
Profile Summary: 
 Experienced data science professional with 3+ years of experience managing teams as well as hands-on in Machine 

Learning, Predictive Modelling, Data Mining and Data Analytics 
 Currently working as a Senior Business analyst at Gartner research and advisory in data science team 
 Post Graduate Diploma in Business Analytics (PGDBA) from IIM Calcutta, ISI Kolkata and IIT Kharagpur (tri-

institute program) 

Work Experience (38 months): 

Sr. Business Analyst Gartner, Gurgaon (India)                                                                                 Feb‘18 – Present 
Leading data science initiatives to solve complex business problems for product and services team 
Team Wide Initiatives 

 Maintaining communication with all stakeholders regarding initiatives undertaken by Team Data Science 
 Responsible for conducting trainings of all new hires in Data Science and Advanced Analytics teams 
 Instrumental in promoting Gartner’s first hiring hackathon (Hack elite) with Hacker earth 
 Successfully conducted Gartner HackElite 2.0 – the second iteration of Gartner campus hiring Hackathon 
 Manager for other team activities – Team Branding, Games, T-shirts, team presentations, etc.  
 Led initiatives on team training through Lunch and Learn Academy (now internal team training sessions) 
 Mentored and Managed interns over data science and multi variate analysis projects 
 Champion for team bonding and engagement initiatives including skits in town halls, event celebrations, etc. 

Project 1: Client Prioritization Algorithms 
 Developed client prioritization algorithm based on business logic as well as data backed insights and 

integrated on UI for end to end automated output generation leading to 80% time savings in manual work 
 Currently leading data science initiatives for automating dynamic prioritization and recommendation 

algorithm which goes to a smooth UI based experience involving cross team stakeholder interaction  
 Led automation efforts to replace excel and slide based reporting with automated server based UI reports 

leading to improved experience coming from increased efficiency and time savings 
Project 2: Client Retention Analysis 

 Develop an enterprise wide algorithm for capturing client Migrations across product known as CMA 
 Performed client retention analysis starting from feature importance and multivariate analysis then 

extending to all Gartner services through a live retention dashboard on PowerBI used for budget analysis 
 Conducted analysis over Gartner Business Services segment involving 10+ practices to find retention drivers 

using Random Forest and Logistic Regression in Python 
 Working on enhancing client’s interaction journey with Gartner over various touch-points involving first 

month, 90 days, mid-year and last 4 months of contract, providing value at each touch-point using KNN 
clustering and Random Forest modelling in Python 

 Building ownership over 'Feedback' theme which covers analysis of all customer feedback into client value  
Project 3: Survey Analysis using NLP 

 Leading client retention analysis through a set of comprehensive surveys including lost clients, value 
statements and renewal surveys and encompassing existing as well as new survey creation 

 Building a comment classifier which can map comments to Business units and summarize voice of customer. 
Includes handling class imbalance, NLP and Random Forest modelling 

Project 4: Contract Data analysis using NLP 
 Spearheaded as a Project manager for Gartner contract reviews involving migration to an NLP Coupled UI  

Lead Business Analyst Optum-UnitedHealth Group, Noida                                                             May’17 – Jan’18 
Worked in New Initiatives team to help people live healthier lives using cutting edge analytics and technology 

 Worked on disease prediction projects and prevention using claims data for millions of patients based on 
deep learning neural networks and Ensemble models (Boosting and bagging coupled together) 

 Provided end to end insights about diseases from diagnosis and procedures using Ensemble modelling in R 

Part Time Article Writer Perceptive Analytics                                                                                  Feb’17 – May’18 
Article development on analytics or marketing based topics along with their practical implementation using R 



Volunteer Analytics Vidhya                                                                                                                Mar’17 – May’18 
Selected as one of the 9 volunteers in Delhi and one of the 36 Volunteers in India 

Guided data science and analytics enthusiasts in choosing the right path towards analytics, organizing meetups, 
hack-a-thons, interaction sessions and promote Analytics Vidhya as they turn 4 that year 

Intern- Analyst McKinsey Knowledge Centre, Gurgaon                                                                    Nov’16 – Apr’17 
One of the five interns to have worked with McKinsey as part of 6 month college internship program comprising 12 credit points 
Project 1: Pricing Diagnostic Tool 

 Worked over 65+ SKUs data in 16 zones to determine the successful drivers for a promotion 
 Generated recommendations to obtain best revenues from current promotional strategies 

Project 2: Supply Chain Research 
 Secondary Research of products and services offered by industry players in forecasting 
 Exploration of forecasting for new product, fashion, spare parts and crowd based 

Software Engineer Adobe Systems, Noida                                                                                            Jun’14 – Jun’15 
 Wrote Automation scripts using JavaScript and Python for functionality testing for Acrobat 
 Diagnosed improvement figures for speed and performance testing with 33% improvement 
 Performed software quality engineering and owned “Recognize Text” and “Scan” features 
 Received spot award as appreciation for significantly enhancing quality of tested areas 

Education: 
Degree/Examination Year Board/University %/CGPA 

Post Graduate Diploma in Business Analytics  2017 IIM Calcutta, ISI Kolkata, IIT Kharagpur 8.44 
B.Tech., Computer Science and Engineering 2014 Harcourt Butler Technological Institute, Kanpur 79.9% 

Class XII 2010 CBSE 82.6% 
Class X 2008 ICSE 93.8% 

Analytics Relevant Projects: 

Sentiment analysis 
of US elections, 
2016 

 Executed the project end to end involving data collection, prediction and reporting 
 Sentiment analysis of US population towards Republican & Democratic party leaders using R 
 Meticulously collected data by mining tweets over a month reaching Gigabytes of data 
 Accurately predicted the course of action and potential winners of the US presidential elections 

Brand Failures  Compiled over 100 brand failures in marketing history and the factors behind those failures 
 Focused on descriptive analysis over actions taken by startups and giants which led to failures 
 Described alternatives which could have avoided failures for brands like Coke, Pepsi and Ford 
 Report included recent failures such as Kingfisher airlines and Yahoo! Games. 

Customer churn 
prediction 

 Applied machine learning models on a dataset with overall missing-ness more than 50% 
 Explored various R packages to impute missing values and their effect on accuracy 
 Implemented ensemble of ensemble models ranging from stacking to weighted voting  
 Measured accuracy measures using ROC curves to reach a value of 0.729 

Marketplace 
Analysis of Fiverr 

 Worked on an End to End study of supply driven marketplace for 65000 gig products 
 Crawled Fiverr gig reviews using selenium package in R over a month for website coverage 
 Analyzed various perspectives covering buyer and seller behavior and overall marketplace 
 Performed comparison of common characteristics with demand driven marketplace Amazon 

Academic Distinctions and Co-curricular achievements:

 1st Runner up out of 892 in 1st Mini Data hack based on time series data prediction at Analytics Vidhya, 2016  
 Attained 99.64%ile overall, 99.27%ile in DILR, 98.53%ile in QA, 98.2%ile in VA out of 1.8 Lac candidates in CAT 2015 
 Attained 98.88%ile overall, 99.11%ile in QA, 95.52%ile in VA out of 1.7 Lac candidates in CAT 2014

NARESH KUMAR SAINI 
Machine Learning Engineer                                                                                        Email: saininaresh4435​@gmail.com 

    B.Tech. Biotechnology Engineering                                                                            LinkedIn: linkedin.com/​in/naresh-saini-b3295812b  
    Contact No: +91-9887960572                                                                                     Github: github.com/saininaresh4435 

Areas of Interest 

Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Computer Vision, Image Processing, Natural Language Processing 
Education 

Year         Degree/Examination                                Institution/Board CGPA/Percentage 

2019 Bachelor of Technology   Indian Institute of Technology, Roorkee 6.887 

2015 Senior Secondary Examination   Shiv Shakti Senior Secondary School, Jaipur(B.S.E.R.) 88.60 
2013 Secondary Examination   Shiv Shakti Senior Secondary School, Jaipur(B.S.E.R.) 82.67 

Work Experience  
Machine Learning Engineer ​| Athenas Owl, Quantiphi Analytics Solution Pvt. Ltd.                     ​       27 May,2019 – Present 

Face Emotion Detection 
● Build a model to detect the facial emotions i.e. Happy, Angry, Sad. 
● Experimented different networks for  image classification like VGG16, ResNet50 and FaceNet. 
● Developed LSTM and Bi-LSTM models using static and temporal information to understand the movements of facial points. 
● Implemented different post processing strategies to improve the model performance. 

Camera Angle Detection 
● Implemented an Inception V3 model to identify different camera angles like High Field, Mid Field, Goal Line Cam etc. 
● Created three negative classes of Mid Field, Closeup and Goal LIne Cam by false positive analysis. 
● Analyze precision and recall at different class wise threshold. Overall achieved precision was 95% and recall was 92%. 
● Used Docker container for model training and prediction for ease of deployment. 

 

     Entity and Logo Detection  
● Implemented a Retina Net model for entity & logo detection like Red & Yellow Card, Trophy, Crowd, Adidas, Telekom etc. 
● Also used Resnet50 and focal loss as a backbone network and loss function respectively. 
● Create input schema to get or update user-defined-parameters from UI & returned TMD(Training MetaData) files. 
● Dockerized both training and prediction panel for deployment on platform. 

                                          Internship  
Medical Image Segmentation​  |​ ​Department of Computer Science and Engineering, IIT Roorkee                         May,2018- 
July,2018 

● Developed an Inception U-Net model for iris segmentation. 
● The performance of the model was tested and evaluated on four different dataset  i.e. Casia3i, Casia4i, IIT Delhi, Ubiris. 
● Model works well even when dealing with difficult iris images such as off-angle images, recorded from various distances with 

different types of occlusions including glasses. 
● I had improved the benchmark of previously dened best model from 84% to 97%. 

                                          Online Courses 
  ​1​.​ Machine Learning by Andrew NG| Coursera  ​2.​  Deep Learning Specialization| Coursera  ​3.​ CS-231, Computer Vision|  
   Stanford University  ​4.​  REST APIs with Flask and Python| Udemy  ​5.​  Intro to Docker and Kubernetes| Udemy

                    ​Coding Languages: ​Python

               FrameWork &Libraries: ​Tensorflow, Keras, Scikit-learn, Opencv

RAJASHREE BANERJEE 

Business Development, Business Strategy, Growth Planning, Delivery 

Management, Client Management and Concept Development 

EDUCATION 

PGDM from IIM Udaipur (Marketing and Operations) 

B.Tech in Chemical Engineering 

 

 

 

          rajashree1106@gmail.com |           +91-7406612000  

PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE (~4 years) 

Management Consultant, Business Growth and Strategy, Ma Foi Strategic Consultants (Present)                                                                          

Client Management and Business Development 

 Client Acquisition for the organisation through F2F meetings and attending Networking sessions with Senior Level Executives 

 Responsible for meeting and maintaining relations with Clients- SPOC for Client Senior Management 

 Identified scope for business expansion, and developed and budgeted the business plan for doubling the revenue in 1 year 

Delivery Management- Projects 

 Spearheaded Growth and Marketing vertical as Lead Business Consultant, from Proposal formulation to Delivery 

 Designed and developed the business growth Strategy for a Construction business worth INR 1000mn for new product line 

 Developed Branding Strategy and Marketing Methodology for a B2B business to accelerate revenue by 1.2x times 

Market Research and Strategy Development 

 Undertook competitor mapping for business verticals within the organisation, and for Clients 

 Consumer Research through Deep Dive Interviews, Focus Group Discussions and Surveys 

 SaaS Based Product Concept Development: Coordinated with Education vertical for product ideation, development and launch 

Training and Knowledge Sharing 

 Conducted in-house training session and Behavioural Workshops attended by all employees and trainees 

 Developed and shared with team the standard best practice and methodology documents for deliveries 

 

 

 

conducted in-house Training and Development Sessions 

 Contributed in the key aspects of various project delivery, and supported new product developments 

Senior Business Development Analyst, Cognizant, US Healthcare (September 2018-April 2019)                                                                          

 Channelized RFP Responses for the business by analysing and interpreting project data, presenting insights and recommendations 

 Participated in Client Engagement in tandem with Senior Leadership through calls and email communications 

 Coordinated work threads and managed design and technical team resources, and contributed to knowledge management 

  Business Analyst, Gokaldas Exports (November 2017-September 2018)                                                                          

Business Growth: Identified gaps in global apparel retail market and pointed to profitable areas for expansion to the tune of INR 2 bn 

Buyer analysis: Insights about buyers’ financial health and strategic moves to understand future trends and investments 

Process Excellence and Business Process Improvement 

 Compared factory wise efficiency, wastage and lead times etc. against profit to indicate cost-effective order allocation 

 Remedied headcount mismatch captured by biometric and manual system resulting in an additional INR 1mn savings 

 Reduction of worker absenteeism by introduction of an empowered leave system which saved costs by INR 1.5 mn 

 Designed Blueprint for a Management Operating System to improve resource utilization, productivity and allocation 

Intern and then Leadership Trainee, after Pre Placement Offer, GE India (April –June 2016 & June-November 2017)                                                                          

 Project Margin Analysis: Monitored and quantified cost overshoot using SAP data, resulting in savings of INR 3mn 

 SKU Traceability: Addressed the traceability issue for 3000 parts in the shop floor and improved the ease of part handling 

 Inventory Lifecycle Management: Performed ABC Analysis for ~10000 parts, rationalised and eliminated close to 500 SKUs 

 Developed a Costing Tool in excel for convenience in project costing improving the time efficiency of the exercise by 70%
